> Tools for formatting GraphQL documents

## Table of Contents

- [Installation](#installation)
- [CLI](#cli)
- [API](#api)

## Installation

```
$ npm i -g gql-format
```

## CLI

```
$ gql-format -h

  Usage: gql-format [options] <glob>

  Tools for formatting GraphQL documents

  Options:

    -h, --help     output usage information
    -V, --version  output the version number

```
